Title: Visiting foods.html
Description: If I visit foods.html, I should see a table of all my foods, with Name, Calories and a delete icon for each food

Title: Filling in Food fields
Description: When I visit foods.html, I can enter a name and calorie amount, and create a new food by clicking "Add Food"

Title: Creating Food
Description: When I click "Add Food", and all fields are filled, the food will appear at the top of the table below

Title: Validating Food Name
Description: When I click "Add Food" and the Name field is blank, a food will not be created, but I will see an error message below the Name field: "Please enter a food name"

Title: Validating Food Calories
Description: When I click "Add Food" and the Calories field is blank, a food will not be created, but I will see an error message below the Calories field: "Please enter a calorie amount"

Title: Clearing Food fields and validations
Description: When I successfully create a food, text fields and any error messages should be cleared

Title: Persisting Foods
Description: When I refresh the foods.html, I will see the same foods persist, in the same order

Title: Deleting foods
Description: When I click the "Delete" icon next to a food, it will be removed from the list.

Title: Persisting deleted foods in diary
Description: Deleted foods will not be removed from meal tables in the diary.

Title: Making foods editable
Description: If I click the Name or Calories field for any given food, it will become an input field containing the current values for that food

Title: Saving changes to foods
Description: When I click on something other than the input field, or press "enter", the field will turn back into plain text

Title: Persisting food changes to diary
Description: When edit a food's Name or Calories, any changes will also be made on the diary

Title: Filtering my foods
Description: I can filter the table of foods by typing into the "Filter by Name" box above the table. Show only foods that match the text typed. Filter the list on each key press. Should be case insensitive

Title: Persisting food changes across refreshes
Description: Except for filtering, any changes I make will persist across refreshes

Title: Viewing meal tables
Description: When I visit index.html (or just `/`), I see tables for each meal for today

Title: Displaying date
Description: When I visit index.html (or just `/`), I see today's date, a way to visit the next day's diary, or the previous day's diary.

Title: Foods in meal tables
Description: Each meal table has a list of foods by name and calorie

Title: Total calories in meal tables
Description: Each meal table has Total Calories below, which is the sum of calories for each food in that meal

Title: Remaining calories in meal tables
Description: Each meal table has Remaining Calories, which is the goal calories minus the total calories. Goal calories are as follows: 200 for Snacks, 400 for Breakfast, 600 for Lunch and 800 for Dinner

Title: Remaining calories less than zero
Description: If Remaining Calories is less than zero, it should be colored Red

Title: Remaining calories more than zero
Description: If Remaining Calories is greater than or equal to zero, it should be colored Green

Title: Totals table
Description: Below the meal tables is a Totals table for all meals, with Goal Calories, Calories Consumed and Remaining calories

Title: Styling Remaining Calories in Totals table
Description: Remaining Calories should follow the same color rules as Remaining Calories in a meal table

Title: Changing diary to previous day
Description: When I click on the link for the previous day, the date changes, and the data in the meal tables update to reflect that day's diary

Title: Changing diary to next day
Description: When I click on the link for the next day, the date changes, and the data in the meal tables update to reflect that day's diary

Title: Foods table in diary
Description: I should see a table of foods I have created under a Foods header. Each food has a Name, Calories and a checkbox

Title: Create New food from diary
Description: If I click on the "Create New button under the Foods header, I should be redirected to â€œfoods.html"

Title: Search for food by name
Description: When I type into the "Search by Name" box above the Foods table, the table will only display foods that match the typed text, case insensitive, across all users. Filter should update with each new character, or removed character.

Title: Add meal to diary
Description: When I click one of the meal buttons under the Add Selected To header, I should see any checked foods appear in the meal table for the clicked meal on the date currently being viewed.

Title: Update calorie totals after adding food
Description: After adding a food to a meal, I should see any relevant Calorie totals update.

Title: Clearing checkboxes after adding food
Description: After adding a food to a meal, I should see the checkboxes in the Foods table clear.

Title: Removing foods from diary
Description: If I click the delete icon next to a food in a meals table, it will be removed from the diary

Title: Updating calorie totals after removing food
Description: If I remove a food from a meal table, any relevant Calorie totals should update

Title: Persisting diary across refreshes
Description: Any changes I make, apart from sorting, filtering and which day I'm viewing, should persist across refreshes
